channel.title: Music Widget
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
• Added localization for Finnish, German, Spanish, and Spanish (Latin America).

• Added additional content to the app's Help Book. Access this from the Help menu.

• Minor performance tuning in the drawing (Core Graphics) code for the UI.

• Enhanced UI in the Updates preferences pane.

• You can now use Music Widget to play another playlist from your Music library.

• Added playback controls to the Dock app icon menu.

• Added localization for Polish.
• The app icon now changes to Dark Mode in the Dock following your app and system preferences.

• New: Option to always keep Dock icon in light mode
  • Update: Preferences has updated panel layouts
  • Update: Spanish localization has updated translations
  • Update: Help Book file has updated screenshots
  • Update: Tweaked the custom Core Graphics drawing for the LCD
  • Update: Playlist chooser UI has an updated layout

• The function to load playlists from Music using Scripting Bridge has been optimized and loading your playlists is now up to 60 times faster!
  • The Widget "Flip" animation has been altered so that the perspective transform you see mid-animation is more apparent; much like the original Dashboard Widgets!
  • The Help Book has been updated with release content from the last and current builds.

• New: The control wheel now takes scroll events from the mouse to adjust volume. Place the mouse cursor anywhere over the control wheel and scroll vertically to adjust the volume more fluidly.
  • Update: Music Widget more accurately detects when the Music app is launched or terminated.
  • Update: Music Widget has enhancements to the Scripting Bridge code for better performance when querying state and info from Music app.
  • Fix: This update addresses an issue where playlists wouldn't load if Music app was loaded after Music Widget was launched and displaying the Playlist chooser.
  • Fix: This update addresses an issue where the Preferences window would not restore to its last position on screen.
  • Update: Additional information and illustrations for using Music Widget were added to the Help Book.

• Built with Xcode 13.1 and the macOS Monterey SDK.
  • Update: Using your trackpad to change the volume is now far more precise. Place your cursor over the control wheel and scroll vertically to adjust the volume using your mouse or trackpad.

• New: The animating (Now Playing) label in the LCD display was completely rewritten and is now more efficient and provides additional functionality.
  • Update: You can now click on the Now Playing label to loop through the available metadata such as track title, artist name, or album title.
  • Update: Additional updates to localization in all supported languages.
  • Update: Additional updates to the Help Book. The Help Book is accessible through the Help menu.

• New: The volume ring from the original iTunes Dashboard widget is back! Drag vertically on the ring or scroll vertically within the ring's bounds to adjust volume.
  • New: Music Widget has additional keywords to make it more discoverable using Spotlight.
  • Fix: Addressed an issue where opening Music Widget would not initially display track information if streaming any Apple Music radio station.
  • Update: Adjusted the Preferences window for more a fluid display of content.
  • Update: There is now more topics in the Help Book including new information for adjusting volume and Dock Menu Items.

Music Widget v1.12

  • Addresses an issue affecting the new Volume Ring UI introduced in v1.11. At times, when dragging the ring to adjust volume, it would get "caught" and prevent volume adjustments.

Music Widget 1.11

  • Fix: Fixes an issue where dragging the volume ring might get "caught".
  • New: The volume ring from the original iTunes Dashboard widget is back! Drag vertically on the ring or scroll vertically within the ring's bounds to adjust volume.
  • New: Music Widget has additional keywords to make it more discoverable using Spotlight.
  • Fix: Addressed an issue where opening Music Widget would not initially display track information if streaming any Apple Music radio station.
  • Update: Adjusted the Preferences window for more a fluid display of content.
  • Update: There is now more topics in the Help Book including new information for adjusting volume and Dock Menu Items.
• The Help Book is now fully searchable from the Help menu. Use the search bar in the Help menu to search for topics applicable to Music Widget (English only).

• New: Option to show/hide the volume buttons has been added to Preferences now that the Volume Ring was introduced in a previous release.
  • Update: Preferences UI updated for a more fluid layout flow, especially for localized content.
